LanguageData.Chicken.label: chicken
LanguageData.Chicken.description: The most traditional farm bird, the chicken is raised for its eggs and meat. It grows very quickly and lays eggs very often.
LanguageData.Chicken.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.Chicken.tools.1.label: beak
LanguageData.Chicken.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Chicken_Corpse.label: chicken corpse
LanguageData.Pig.label: pig
LanguageData.Pig.description: The pig was one of the first animals domesticated by humans. It is commonly raised for meat, and is easy to feed because of its omnivorous diet. Though pigs are self-serving by disposition, they can be trained in complex tasks.
LanguageData.Pig.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Pig_Leather.label: pig leather
LanguageData.Pig_Corpse.label: pig corpse
LanguageData.Cow.label: cow
LanguageData.Cow.description: A large domesticated ungulate, cows have been bred for millennia to produce huge amounts of milk, meat, and leather. They are exceptionally gentle creatures and will never seek revenge, no matter how many times they are harmed. Most of them are so adapted to farm life that they cannot survive in the wild.
LanguageData.Cow.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Cow.tools.2.label: horns
LanguageData.Cow_Leather.label: cow leather
LanguageData.Cow_Corpse.label: cow corpse
LanguageData.Alpaca.label: alpaca
LanguageData.Alpaca.description: A medium-sized ungulate closely related to the llama, the alpaca is often farmed for its remarkably soft wool.
LanguageData.Alpaca.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Alpaca.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Alpaca.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Alpaca_Leather.label: alpaca leather
LanguageData.Alpaca_Corpse.label: alpaca corpse
LanguageData.Duck.label: duck
LanguageData.Duck.description: A very common type of farm bird, also appearing in the wild, the duck is raised for its delicious meat. It grows quick but lays eggs quite rarely.
LanguageData.Duck.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.Duck.tools.1.label: beak
LanguageData.Duck.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Duck_Corpse.label: duck corpse
LanguageData.Bison.label: bison
LanguageData.Bison.description: A large plant eating mammal appearing in the savannah wilderness. Tamed are quite docile, but enraged are fast and dangerous.
LanguageData.Bison.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Bison.tools.1.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Bison.tools.2.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Bison.tools.3.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Bison.tools.5.label: head
LanguageData.Bison_Leather.label: bison leather
LanguageData.Bison_Corpse.label: bison corpse
LanguageData.Goat.label: goat
LanguageData.Goat.description: Naturally curious about the world, goats are among the friendliest domesticated creature bred by mankind.
LanguageData.Goat.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Goat_Leather.label: goat leather
LanguageData.Goat_Corpse.label: goat corpse
LanguageData.Goose.label: goose
LanguageData.Goose.description: A domesticated bird kept by humans as poultry for it's eggs and meat. Lays eggs very often, however they take a long time to hatch.
LanguageData.Goose.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.Goose.tools.1.label: beak
LanguageData.Goose.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Goose_Leather.label: goose leather
LanguageData.Goose_Corpse.label: goose corpse
LanguageData.Yak.label: yak
LanguageData.Yak.description: Yaks are robust cattle with a bulky frame, short but thick legs, and rounded cloven hooves that are splayed to help them walk in snow.
LanguageData.Yak.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Yak.tools.1.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Yak.tools.2.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Yak.tools.3.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Yak.tools.5.label: head
LanguageData.Yak_Leather.label: yak leather
LanguageData.Yak_Corpse.label: yak corpse
LanguageData.GuineaPig.label: guinea pig
LanguageData.GuineaPig.description: Neither a pig or a creature from Guinea, these little rodents are bred to be a household pet and a delicious dinner.
LanguageData.GuineaPig.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GuineaPig.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GuineaPig.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.GuineaPig_Leather.label: guinea pig leather
LanguageData.GuineaPig_Corpse.label: guinea pig corpse
LanguageData.Donkey.label: donkey
LanguageData.Donkey.description: A small relative of the horse, domesticated in ancient times for farm work. Its goofy call is simultaneously annoying and endearing.
LanguageData.Donkey.tools.0.label: left hoof
LanguageData.Donkey.tools.1.label: right hoof
LanguageData.Donkey.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Donkey_Leather.label: donkey leather
